alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 1:37PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Jefferson, northwestern Taylor and southwestern Madison Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 137 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Monticello to 21 miles northwest of Perry to 16 miles east of St. Marks. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Goose Pasture, Iddo, Ebb, Lamont, Aucilla, Capps, Lois, Eridu, Nash, Cabbage Grove, Drifton, Scanlon, Casa Blanco, Econfina, Waukeenah, Montivilla and Sirmans. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison
